tability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"","type":"address"}],"name":"stakeholders","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"stakingBalance","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"weight","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"startDate","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"lastClaimed","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"releaseDate","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"releaseAmount","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"newStake","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"lockedRewards","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"stakingToken","outputs":[{"internalType":"contract IERC20","name":"","type":"address"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"startDate","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"symbol","outputs":[{"internalType":"string","name":"","type":"string"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"weightExponent","type":"uint256"}],"name":"totalLockedRewards","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"totalLocked","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"weightExponent","type":"uint256"}],"name":"totalNewStake","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"totalNew","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"period","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"weightExponent","type":"uint256"}],"name":"totalStakingBalance","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"totalStaking","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"newOwner","type":"address"}],"name":"transferOwnership","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"value","type":"uint256"}],"name":"updateCoolDownPeriod","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"value","type":"uint256"}],"name":"updateEarlyWithdrawalFee","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"value","type":"uint256"}],"name":"updateExtraRewardMultiplier","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"value","type":"uint256"}],"name":"updateMaxNumberOfPeriods","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"value","type":"address"}],"name":"updateSignatureAddress","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address[]","name":"stakeholders_","type":"address[]"},{"internalType":"uint256[]","name":"weights_","type":"uint256[]"}],"name":"updateWeightBatch","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"name":"weightCounts","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"withdrawFunds","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"amount","type":"uint256"}],"name":"withdrawRemainingFunds","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"author":"Kasper De Blieck (kasperdeblieck@cooker.art) This contract allows Cooker token owners to stake their funds. Staking funds will reward a periodic compounded interest.","events":{"Active(address,bool)":{"params":{"active_":"yes if the staker becomes active, false if inactive","stakeholder_":"address of the stakeholder"}},"ConfigUpdate(string,uint256)":{"params":{"field_":"of the field","value_":"new value of the field"}},"InitiateWithdraw(address,uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"amount_":"amount of tokens withdrawn from the contract ","releaseDate_":"timestamp when cooldown is over for the user  ","stakeholder_":"address of the stakeholder"}},"Rewarding(address,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"lockedReward_":"amount of additional reward that is locked","numberOfPeriods_":"number of periods rewarded","reward_":"reward claimed","stakeholder_":"address of the stakeholder"}},"Staking(address,uint256)":{"params":{"stake_":"new amount of staked tokens","stakeholder_":"address of the stakeholder"}},"Withdraw(address,uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"amount_":"amount of tokens sent to the stakeholder","fee_":"fee paid for early withdrawal","stakeholder_":"address of the stakeholder"}}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"_recoverSigner(address,uint256,bytes)":{"params":{"sender":"the address of the message sender","signature":"a signature of the contract address, senderAddress and tokensId.   Should be signed by the private key of signerAddress.","weight":"amount of tokens to mint"}},"activeStakeholder(address)":{"returns":{"active":"true if stakeholder holds active balance"}},"balanceOf(address)":{"params":{"stakeholderAddress":"the address to return the balance for"},"returns":{"balance":"the sum of total stakingbalance, reward and locked tokens"}},"calculateRewardPerPeriod()":{"returns":{"rewardPerPeriod":"the reward per period based on current token balans"}},"calculateRewards(address,uint256)":{"params":{"endPeriod":"The rewards will be calculated until this period.","stakeholderAddress":"The address to calculate rewards for"},"returns":{"lockedRewards":"The additional locked rewards for this period","reward":"The rewards of the stakeholder for previous periods that can be claimed instantly.","stakeholder":"The new object containing stakeholder state"}},"claimRewards(uint256,bool)":{"details":"Calls `handleRewards` for the sender","params":{"endPeriod":"The periods to claim rewards for.","withdraw":"if true, send the rewards to the stakeholder.  if false, add the rewards to the staking balance of the stakeholder."}},"claimRewardsAsOwner(address[])":{"details":"Calls `handleRewards` in a loop for the stakers defined","params":{"stakeholders_":"list of stakeholders to claim rewards for"}},"currentPeriod()":{"returns":{"period":"the current period"}},"handleNewPeriod(uint256)":{"params":{"endPeriod":"the last period the function should handle.  cannot exceed the current period."}},"increaseWeight(uint256,bytes)":{"params":{"signature":"A signature proving the sender  is allowed to update his weight.","weight_":"The new weight."}},"owner()":{"details":"Returns the address of the current owner."},"renounceOwnership()":{"details":"Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner."},"requestWithdrawal(uint256,bool,bool)":{"details":"the request will set the releaseDate for the stakeholder to `cooldown` time in the future, and the releaseAmount to the amount requested for withdrawal.","params":{"amount":"The amount to withdraw, capped by the total stake + owed rewards.","claimRewardsFirst":"a boolean flag: should be set to true if you want to claim your rewards. If set to false, all owed rewards will be dropped. Build in for safety, funds can be withdrawn even when the reward calculations encounters a breaking bug.","instant":"If set to true, the `withdrawFunds` function will be called at the end of the request. No second transaction is needed, but the full `earlyWithdrawalFee` needs to be paid."}},"stake(uint256)":{"params":{"amount":"The amount to stake"}},"totalLockedRewards(uint256)":{"params":{"weightExponent":"How many times does the stake need to be multiplied with the weight?"},"returns":{"totalLocked":"the total new amount staked to be included next period."}},"totalNewStake(uint256)":{"params":{"weightExponent":"How many times does the stake need to be multiplied with the weight?"},"returns":{"totalNew":"the total new amount staked to be included next period."}},"totalStakingBalance(uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"period":"The period for which to call the balance","weightExponent":"How many times does the stake need to be multiplied with the weight?"},"returns":{"totalStaking":"the total amount staked for the parameters."}},"transferOwnership(address)":{"details":"Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner."},"updateCoolDownPeriod(uint256)":{"params":{"value":"The new cooldown per period"}},"updateEarlyWithdrawalFee(uint256)":{"params":{"value":"The new fee"}},"updateExtraRewardMultiplier(uint256)":{"params":{"value":"The new reward per period"}},"updateMaxNumberOfPeriods(uint256)":{"params":{"value":"the new end date after which rewards will stop"}},"updateSignatureAddress(address)":{"params":{"value":"the new address to use for verification"}},"updateWeightBatch(address[],uint256[])":{"params":{"stakeholders_":"The stakeholders","weights_":"The new weights.  is allowed to update his weight."}},"withdrawRemainingFunds(uint256)":{"params":{"amount":"the amount to withraw as owner"}}},"title":"A staking contract for Cooker tokens","version":1},"userdoc":{"events":{"Active(address,bool)":{"notice":"Emits when a new staker enters the contract by staking or existing stakeholder leaves by withdrawing"},"ConfigUpdate(string,uint256)":{"notice":"Emits when a config field is updated"},"InitiateWithdraw(address,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Emits when a stakeholder requested a withdrawal"},"Rewarding(address,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Emits when stakeholder claims rewards"},"Staking(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Emits when new address stakes"},"Withdraw(address,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Emits when a stakeholder finalizes a withdrawal"}},"kind":"user","methods":{"_recoverSigner(address,uint256,bytes)":{"notice":"Checks if the signature is created out of the contract address, sender and new weight, signed by the private key of the signerAddress"},"activeStakeholder(address)":{"notice":"Checks if a stakeholder is still active Active stakeholders have at least one of following things: - positive staking balance - positive new stake to be added next period - positive locked tokens that can come in circulation "},"balanceOf(address)":{"notice":"Returns the tokens staked, the rewards earned and locked tokens as balance for a stakeholder. Used in applications expecting the ERC20 interface, e.g. Metamask"},"calculateRewardPerPeriod()":{"notice":"Calculate reward for previous day when balance is known If no stakingbalance is present, rewardPerPeriod will stay 0"},"calculateRewards(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Calculate the rewards owed to a stakeholder. The interest will be calculated based on:  - The reward to divide in this period  - The the relative stake of the stakeholder (taking previous rewards in account)  - The time the stakeholder has been staking. The formula of compounding interest is applied, meaning rewards on rewards are calculated."},"claimRewards(uint256,bool)":{"notice":"Function to claim the rewards earned by staking for the sender."},"claimRewardsAsOwner(address[])":{"notice":"Function to claim the rewards for a list of stakers as owner. No funds are withdrawn, only staking balances are updated."},"constructor":{"notice":"Sets a number of initial state variables"},"currentPeriod()":{"notice":"Calculates how many reward periods passed since the start."},"handleDecreasingMaxWeight()":{"notice":"Updates maxWeight in case there are no stakeholders with this weight left"},"handleNewPeriod(uint256)":{"notice":"Function to call when a new reward period is entered. The function will increment the maxRewardPeriod field, making the state of previous period immutable. The state will use the state of the last period as start for the current period. The total staking balance is updated with: - stake added in previous period - rewards earned in previous period - locked tokens, if they are unlocked."},"increaseWeight(uint256,bytes)":{"notice":"Increase the stake of the sender by a value."},"requestWithdrawal(uint256,bool,bool)":{"notice":"Request to withdrawal funds from the contract. The funds will not be regarded as stake anymore: no rewards can be earned anymore. The funds are not withdrawn directly, they can be claimed with `withdrawFunds` after the cooldown period has passed."},"stake(uint256)":{"notice":"Increase the stake of the sender by a value."},"totalLockedRewards(uint256)":{"notice":"Calculates the new total locked rewards accumulated since latest unlock date. Also weighted (or multiple weighted) balances can be returned"},"totalNewStake(uint256)":{"notice":"Calculates the new staking balance accumulated in the current period. Also weighted (or multiple weighted) balances can be returned"},"totalStakingBalance(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Calculates the staking balance for a certain period. Can provide the current balance or balance to be added next period. Also weighted (or multiple weighted) balances can be returned"},"updateCoolDownPeriod(uint256)":{"notice":"Updates the cooldown period."},"updateEarlyWithdrawalFee(uint256)":{"notice":"Updates the early withdraw fee."},"updateExtraRewardMultiplier(uint256)":{"notice":"Updates the extra reward multiplier, starting instantly. Take into account this value will be divided by decimalPrecision in order to allow multipliers < 1 up to 0.000001."},"updateSignatureAddress(address)":{"notice":"Update the address used to verify signatures"},"updateWeightBatch(address[],uint256[])":{"notice":"Update the stake of a list of stakeholders as owner."},"withdrawFunds()":{"notice":"Withdraw staked funds from the contract. Can only be triggered after `requestWithdrawal` has been called. If funds are withdrawn before the cooldown period has passed, a fee will fee deducted. Withdrawing the funds when triggering `requestWithdrawal` will result in a fee equal to `earlyWithdrawalFee`. Waiting until the cooldown period has passed results in no fee. Withdrawing at any other moment between these two periods in time results in a fee that lineairy decreases with time."},"withdrawRemainingFunds(uint256)":{"notice":"Owner function to transfer the staking token from the contract address to the contract owner. The amount cannot exceed the amount staked by the stakeholders, making sure the funds of stakeholders stay in the contract. Unclaimed rewards and locked rewards cannot be withdrawn either."}},"version":1}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"project:/contracts/CookerStaking.sol":"CookerStaking"},"evmVersion":"istanbul","libraries":{},"metadata":{"bytecodeHash":"ipfs"},"optimizer":{"enabled":false,"runs":200},"remappings":[]},"sources":{"@openzeppelin/contracts/access/Ownable.sol":{"keccak256":"0x6bb804a310218875e89d12c053e94a13a4607cdf7cc2052f3e52bd32a0dc50a1","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://b2ebbbe6d0011175bd9e7268b83de3f9c2f9d8d4cbfbaef12aff977d7d727163","dweb:/ipfs/Qmd5c7Vxtis9wzkDNhxwc6A2QT5H9xn9kfjhx7qx44vpro"]},"@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC20/IERC20.sol":{"keccak256":"0x027b891937d20ccf213fdb9c31531574256de774bda99d3a70ecef6e1913ed2a","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://087318b21c528119f649899f5b5580566dd8d7b0303d4904bd0e8580c3545f14","dweb:/ipfs/Qmbn5Mj7aUn8hJuQ8VrQjjEXRsXyJKykgnjR9p4C3nfLtL"]},"@openzeppelin/contracts/utils/Context.sol":{"keccak256":"0x90565a39ae45c80f0468dc96c7b20d0afc3055f344c8203a0c9258239f350b9f","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://26e8b38a7ac8e7b4463af00cf7fff1bf48ae9875765bf4f7751e100124d0bc8c","dweb:/ipfs/QmWcsmkVr24xmmjfnBQZoemFniXjj3vwT78Cz6uqZW1Hux"]},"@openzeppelin/contracts/utils/cryptography/ECDSA.sol":{"keccak256":"0xbc991a1cf357ce19480831a40792c814238a3b5458134703682abd8aa39719fb","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://ab2e3313add3a233ad2d1e9b65cb7c0296bdbe159c6d631da2b1d027b4954926","dweb:/ipfs/QmT8bVda92mptimLgonyq28qENq4sRgy6K3v118CvZcKdP"]},"@openzeppelin/contracts/utils/math/SafeMath.sol":{"keccak256":"0x8666f020bd8fc9dc14f07e2ebc52b5f236ab4cdde7c77679b08cb2f94730043b","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://163776cbf565c722232393aa2d62cbe8a2ffb5805986abf4906c00e1e07450a6","dweb:/ipfs/QmPZoN9T3cb6o8bGhjBPZcz7im8T8DWhpr3tjLwhJJHx9N"]},"project:/contracts/CookerStaking.sol":{"keccak256":"0xf4c9a1e8e32ff2b7fa09749f6a4cf7964884dd7e984f5f99378988c0c3332d79","license":"UNLICENSED","urls":["bzz-raw://1559fa903127afc2cab31dec7e865ed216fbf08cca7d8a30ec34d86369767eee","dweb:/ipfs/QmVZczKqgZGtL8Acf6FXy6nVtm8bijs4Jr deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

documentation.text: Sets a number of initial state variables

Function to call when a new reward period is entered.
 The function will increment the maxRewardPeriod field,
 making the state of previous period immutable.
 The state will use the state of the last period as start for the current period.
 The total staking balance is updated with:
 - stake added in previous period
 - rewards earned in previous period
 - locked tokens, if they are unlocked.
 @param endPeriod the last period the function should handle.
  cannot exceed the current period.

Increase the stake of the sender by a value.
 @param amount The amount to stake

Withdraw staked funds from the contract.
 Can only be triggered after `requestWithdrawal` has been called.
 If funds are withdrawn before the cooldown period has passed,
 a fee will fee deducted. Withdrawing the funds when triggering
 `requestWithdrawal` will result in a fee equal to `earlyWithdrawalFee`.
 Waiting until the cooldown period has passed results in no fee.
 Withdrawing at any other moment between these two periods in time
 results in a fee that lineairy decreases with time.

Owner function to transfer the staking token from the contract
 address to the contract owner.
 The amount cannot exceed the amount staked by the stakeholders,
 making sure the funds of stakeholders stay in the contract.
 Unclaimed rewards and locked rewards cannot be withdrawn either.
 @param amount the amount to withraw as owner

Update the address used to verify signatures
 @param value the new address to use for verification
@param value the new end date after which rewards will stop

Updates the cooldown period.
 @param value The new cooldown per period

Updates the early withdraw fee.
 @param value The new fee

Updates the extra reward multiplier, starting instantly.
 Take into account this value will be divided by decimalPrecision
 in order to allow multipliers < 1 up to 0.000001.
 @param value The new reward per period

Calculates how many reward periods passed since the start.
 @return period the current period
Updates maxWeight in case there are no stakeholders with this weight left

Checks if a stakeholder is still active
 Active stakeholders have at least one of following things:
 - positive staking balance
 - positive new stake to be added next period
 - positive locked tokens that can come in circulation 
 @return active true if stakeholder holds active balance
Sets a number of initial state variables

Function to call when a new reward period is entered.
 The function will increment the maxRewardPeriod field,
 making the state of previous period immutable.
 The state will use the state of the last period as start for the current period.
 The total staking balance is updated with:
 - stake added in previous period
 - rewards earned in previous period
 - locked tokens, if they are unlocked.
 @param endPeriod the last period the function should handle.
  cannot exceed the current period.

Increase the stake of the sender by a value.
 @param amount The amount to stake

Withdraw staked funds from the contract.
 Can only be triggered after `requestWithdrawal` has been called.
 If funds are withdrawn before the cooldown period has passed,
 a fee will fee deducted. Withdrawing the funds when triggering
 `requestWithdrawal` will result in a fee equal to `earlyWithdrawalFee`.
 Waiting until the cooldown period has passed results in no fee.
 Withdrawing at any other moment between these two periods in time
 results in a fee that lineairy decreases with time.

Owner function to transfer the staking token from the contract
 address to the contract owner.
 The amount cannot exceed the amount staked by the stakeholders,
 making sure the funds of stakeholders stay in the contract.
 Unclaimed rewards and locked rewards cannot be withdrawn either.
 @param amount the amount to withraw as owner

Update the address used to verify signatures
 @param value the new address to use for verification
@param value the new end date after which rewards will stop

Updates the cooldown period.
 @param value The new cooldown per period

 in order to allow multipliers < 1 up to 0.000001.
 @param value The new reward per period

Calculates how many reward periods passed since the start.
 @return period the current period
Updates maxWeight in case there are no stakeholders with this weight left

Checks if a stakeholder is still active
 Active stakeholders have at least one of following things:
 - positive staking balance
 - positive new stake to be added next period
 - positive locked tokens that can come in circulation 
 @return active true if stakeholder holds active balance

devdoc.author: Kasper De Blieck (kasperdeblieck@cooker.art) This contract allows Cooker token owners to stake their funds. Staking funds will reward a periodic compounded interest.

params.active_: yes if the staker becomes active, false if inactive

params.amount_: amount of tokens withdrawn from the contract
params.releaseDate_: timestamp when cooldown is over for the user

params.lockedReward_: amount of additional reward that is locked

params.amount_: amount of tokens sent to the stakeholder

params.sender: the address of the message sender
params.signature: a signature of the contract address, senderAddress and tokensId.   Should be signed by the private key of signerAddress.

returns.active: true if stakeholder holds active balance

params.stakeholderAddress: the address to return the balance for

returns.balance: the sum of total stakingbalance, reward and locked tokens

returns.rewardPerPeriod: the reward per period based on current token balans

params.endPeriod: The rewards will be calculated until this period.
params.stakeholderAddress: The address to calculate rewards for

returns.lockedRewards: The additional locked rewards for this period
returns.reward: The rewards of the stakeholder for previous periods that can be claimed instantly.
returns.stakeholder: The new object containing stakeholder state

params.endPeriod: The periods to claim rewards for.
params.withdraw: if true, send the rewards to the stakeholder.  if false, add the rewards to the staking balance of the stakeholder.

claimRewardsAsOwner(address[]).details: Calls `handleRewards` in a loop for the stakers defined

params.stakeholders_: list of stakeholders to claim rewards for

params.endPeriod: the last period the function should handle.  cannot exceed the current period.

params.signature: A signature proving the sender  is allowed to update his weight.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

requestWithdrawal(uint256,bool,bool).details: the request will set the releaseDate for the stakeholder to `cooldown` time in the future, and the releaseAmount to the amount requested for withdrawal.

params.amount: The amount to withdraw, capped by the total stake + owed rewards.
params.claimRewardsFirst: a boolean flag: should be set to true if you want to claim your rewards. If set to false, all owed rewards will be dropped. Build in for safety, funds can be withdrawn even when the reward calculations encounters a breaking bug.
params.instant: If set to true, the `withdrawFunds` function will be called at the end of the request. No second transaction is needed, but the full `earlyWithdrawalFee` needs to be paid.

params.weightExponent: How many times does the stake need to be multiplied with the weight?

returns.totalLocked: the total new amount staked to be included next period.

params.weightExponent: How many times does the stake need to be multiplied with the weight?

returns.totalNew: the total new amount staked to be included next period.

params.period: The period for which to call the balance
params.weightExponent: How many times does the stake need to be multiplied with the weight?

returns.totalStaking: the total amount staked for the parameters.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.value: the new end date after which rewards will stop
the new address to use for verification

params.weights_: The new weights.  is allowed to update his weight.

params.amount: the amount to withraw as owner

devdoc.title: A staking contract for Cooker tokens

Active(address,bool).notice: Emits when a new staker enters the contract by staking or existing stakeholder leaves by withdrawing

ConfigUpdate(string,uint256).notice: Emits when a config field is updated

InitiateWithdraw(address,uint256,uint256.notice: Emits when a stakeholder requested a withdrawal

Withdraw(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Emits when a stakeholder finalizes a withdrawal

_recoverSigner(address,uint256,bytes).notice: Checks if the signature is created out of the contract address, sender and new weight, signed by the private key of the signerAddress

activeStakeholder(address).notice: Checks if a stakeholder is still active Active stakeholders have at least one of following things: - positive staking balance - positive new stake to be added next period - positive locked tokens that can come in circulation

balanceOf(address).notice: Returns the tokens staked, the rewards earned and locked tokens as balance for a stakeholder. Used in applications expecting the ERC20 interface, e.g. Metamask

calculateRewardPerPeriod().notice: Calculate reward for previous day when balance is known If no stakingbalance is present, rewardPerPeriod will stay 0

calculateRewards(address,uint256).notice: Calculate the rewards owed to a stakeholder. The interest will be calculated based on:  - The reward to divide in this period  - The the relative stake of the stakeholder (taking previous rewards in account)  - The time the stakeholder has been staking. The formula of compounding interest is applied, meaning rewards on rewards are calculated.

claimRewards(uint256,bool).notice: Function to claim the rewards earned by staking for the sender.

claimRewardsAsOwner(address[]).notice: Function to claim the rewards for a list of stakers as owner. No funds are withdrawn, only staking balances are updated.

constructor.notice: Sets a number of initial state variables

currentPeriod().notice: Calculates how many reward periods passed since the start.

handleDecreasingMaxWeight().notice: Updates maxWeight in case there are no stakeholders with this weight left

handleNewPeriod(uint256).notice: Function to call when a new reward period is entered. The function will increment the maxRewardPeriod field, making the state of previous period immutable. The state will use the state of the last period as start for the current period. The total staking balance is updated with: - stake added in previous period - rewards earned in previous period - locked tokens, if they are unlocked.

increaseWeight(uint256,bytes).notice: Increase the stake of the sender by a value.

requestWithdrawal(uint256,bool,bool).notice: Request to withdrawal funds from the contract. The funds will not be regarded as stake anymore: no rewards can be earned anymore. The funds are not withdrawn directly, they can be claimed with `withdrawFunds` after the cooldown period has passed.

stake(uint256).notice: Increase the stake of the sender by a value.

totalLockedRewards(uint256).notice: Calculates the new total locked rewards accumulated since latest unlock date. Also weighted (or multiple weighted) balances can be returned

totalNewStake(uint256).notice: Calculates the new staking balance accumulated in the current period. Also weighted (or multiple weighted) balances can be returned

totalStakingBalance(uint256,uint256).notice: Calculates the staking balance for a certain period. Can provide the current balance or balance to be added next period. Also weighted (or multiple weighted) balances can be returned

updateExtraRewardMultiplier(uint256).notice: Updates the extra reward multiplier, starting instantly. Take into account this value will be divided by decimalPrecision in order to allow multipliers < 1 up to 0.000001.

updateSignatureAddress(address).notice: Update the address used to verify signatures

updateWeightBatch(address[],uint256[]).notice: Update the stake of a list of stakeholders as owner.

withdrawFunds().notice: Withdraw staked funds from the contract. Can only be triggered after `requestWithdrawal` has been called. If funds are withdrawn before the cooldown period has passed, a fee will fee deducted. Withdrawing the funds when triggering `requestWithdrawal` will result in a fee equal to `earlyWithdrawalFee`. Waiting until the cooldown period has passed results in no fee. Withdrawing at any other moment between these two periods in time results in a fee that lineairy decreases with time.

withdrawRemainingFunds(uint256).notice: Owner function to transfer the staking token from the contract address to the contract owner. The amount cannot exceed the amount staked by the stakeholders, making sure the funds of stakeholders stay in the contract. Unclaimed rewards and locked rewards cannot be withdrawn either.
